48 int xta_acquired_xa_resource_init(xta_acquired_xa_resource_t *this,
49  const struct xta_iface_s *iface,
50  const char *name,
51  const char *open_info)
52 {
53  enum Exception { NULL_OBJECT1
54  , OBJ_CORRUPTED
55  , NULL_OBJECT2
56  , INVALID_OPTION1
57  , INVALID_OPTION2
58  , XTA_XA_RESOURCE_INIT_ERROR
59  , XML_STRDUP_ERROR
60  , NONE } excp;
61  int ret_cod = LIXA_RC_INTERNAL_ERROR;
62 
63  LIXA_TRACE(("xta_acquired_xa_resource_init\n"));
64  TRY {
65  if (NULL == this)
66  THROW(NULL_OBJECT1);
67  /* check the object has not already been initialized */
68  if (NULL != this->xa_resource.rsrmgr_config.name)
69  THROW(OBJ_CORRUPTED);
70  /* interface can't be NULL */
71  if (NULL == iface)
72  THROW(NULL_OBJECT2);
73  /* name can't be NULL or empty */
74  if (NULL == name || 0 == strlen(name))
75  THROW(INVALID_OPTION1);
76  /* open_info can't be NULL or empty */
77  if (NULL == open_info || 0 == strlen(open_info))
78  THROW(INVALID_OPTION2);
79  if (strlen(open_info) >= MAXINFOSIZE) {
80  LIXA_TRACE(("xta_acquired_xa_resource_init: option open_info "
81  "(" SIZE_T_FORMAT ")"
82  "exceeds MAXINFOSIZE %d\n", strlen(open_info),
83  MAXINFOSIZE));
84  }
85  /*
86  * call parent initializator
87  * Acquired XA Resources don't generally need explicit
88  * xa_open, xa_close
89  */
90  if (LIXA_RC_OK != (ret_cod = xta_xa_resource_init(
91  (xta_xa_resource_t *)this, FALSE)))
92  THROW(XTA_XA_RESOURCE_INIT_ERROR);
93  /* set object properties */
94  this->iface = iface;
95  if (NULL == (this->xa_resource.rsrmgr_config.name =
96  xmlCharStrdup(name)))
97  THROW(XML_STRDUP_ERROR);
98  strncpy(this->xa_resource.rsrmgr_config.xa_open_info,
99  open_info, MAXINFOSIZE);
100  this->xa_resource.rsrmgr_config.xa_open_info[MAXINFOSIZE-1] = '\0';
101 
102  THROW(NONE);
103  } CATCH {
104  switch (excp) {
105  case NULL_OBJECT1:
106  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_NULL_OBJECT;
107  break;
108  case OBJ_CORRUPTED:
109  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_OBJ_CORRUPTED;
110  break;
111  case NULL_OBJECT2:
112  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_NULL_OBJECT;
113  break;
114  case INVALID_OPTION1:
115  case INVALID_OPTION2:
116  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_INVALID_OPTION;
117  break;
118  case XTA_XA_RESOURCE_INIT_ERROR:
119  break;
120  case XML_STRDUP_ERROR:
121  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_XML_STRDUP_ERROR;
122  break;
123  case NONE:
124  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_OK;
125  break;
126  default:
127  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_INTERNAL_ERROR;
128  } /* switch (excp) */
129  } /* TRY-CATCH */
130  LIXA_TRACE(("xta_acquired_xa_resource_init/excp=%d/"
131  "ret_cod=%d/errno=%d\n", excp, ret_cod, errno));
132  return ret_cod;
133 }
134 
135 
136 
137 void xta_acquired_xa_resource_clean(xta_acquired_xa_resource_t *this)
138 {
139  enum Exception { NULL_OBJECT
140  , NONE } excp;
141  int ret_cod = LIXA_RC_INTERNAL_ERROR;
142 
143  LIXA_TRACE(("xta_acquired_xa_resource_clean\n"));
144  TRY {
145  if (NULL == this)
146  THROW(NULL_OBJECT);
147  if (NULL != this->xa_resource.rsrmgr_config.name) {
148  g_free(this->xa_resource.rsrmgr_config.name);
149  this->xa_resource.rsrmgr_config.name = NULL;
150  }
151  this->xa_resource.rsrmgr_config.xa_open_info[0] = '\0';
152 
153  THROW(NONE);
154  } CATCH {
155  switch (excp) {
156  case NULL_OBJECT:
157  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_NULL_OBJECT;
158  break;
159  case NONE:
160  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_OK;
161  break;
162  default:
163  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_INTERNAL_ERROR;
164  } /* switch (excp) */
165  } /* TRY-CATCH */
166  LIXA_TRACE(("xta_acquired_xa_resource_clean/excp=%d/"
167  "ret_cod=%d/errno=%d\n", excp, ret_cod, errno));
168  return;
169 }
